entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
